title: If this were D&D...
author: JGray
text:
... Chrys might very well be a bard. Sure, she's used magic before but she's certainly showing some roguish qualities here, isn't she?

What do you think?

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: I'm just thinking that Mandrake's gonna have a roguish revenge scheme of her own when this is done.

replies.author: Kona*Guest*
replies.text: LOL "exit, stage left".  Wonder if she should at least wait to see what this great ride is like.

replies.author: Ayshara*Guest*
replies.text:
A bard would fit her but I personally see her being a Chaotic good if not lawful good mage-bard.

Theresa would definitely be a Chaotic Neutral with a Warrior slant and perhaps Berserker rage.
